main.name: Crystal Chen
main.description: I am a full stack developer who studied Computer Science with a focus on software principles and design at Brown University.

resume.skillmessage: I have experience with both front-end and back-end languages, as well as version control using Git.

education.description: Originally an Applied Mathematics major, I discovered my passion for software engineering during an intro level computer science course and have since explored various areas in the field through courses, projects, and research experiences.
